post.description: Submits a job application for the authenticated user. The user must not have already applied for the job.

job_id.description: The ID of the job the user is applying for.

cover_letter.description: Optional cover letter provided by the applicant.
cover_letter.example: I am very interested in this position and believe I am a great fit.

resume_url.description: Optional URL pointing to the applicant's resume.

post.summary: Create or update a job posting
post.description: Creates a new job posting or updates an existing one if an 'id' is provided. The authenticated user is automatically set as the poster.

id.description: Job ID for updating an existing job. Omit or set to 0 for new job creation.

created_at.description: Job creation date (usually ignored on creation)

updated_at.description: Job update date (usually ignored on creation)

employment_status.description: Employment status (e.g., Full Time, Part Time, Contract, Internship)

job_icon.description: Icon or image path for the job

required_video_cv.description: Whether a video CV is required

application_method_details.description: Additional details on how to apply
